subject: [Radiance-general] Regarding Radiance Installation, Qt-based rvu,and Objline issues
body:
Thanks Randolph.

Is there any documentation to properly install Radiance (latest one from
NREL) ? Or if you can give some hint, because I couldn't find any such
discussion on the web. Or my installation process mentioned in the trailing
is good enough. Thanks!

Vaib
